entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a village in the Harry Potter series, mentioned as being located north of Hogwarts.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a wandmaker who is rumored to have created a duplicate of the Elder Wand. He started this rumor himself for business purposes.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand, also known as the Deathstick, is one of the three Deathly Hallows and a powerful magical object.

entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: The Deathly Hallows are three powerful magical objects created by Death herself: the Elder Wand, the Resurrection Stone, and the Cloak of Invisibility.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a wandmaker who is an expert in wands and their history. He denies knowing about the Deathly Hallows.

relationships.description: Gregorovitch created a duplicate of the Elder Wand, which he used to start a rumor about his business.
Harry questioned Ollivander about the Deathly Hallows and Gregorovitch's involvement with them.
